name: WestGunner
description:
In the game you play a Cowboy in the Wild West. You play in the bird's-eye view and have to shoot enemies and dodge their shots until the endboss appears. If you beat him, you won the game.

Controls:

- WASD or arrow keys to move

- Z and X to shoot or optional with the left mouse button

- RETURN to pause the game

- SPACE to open the inventory or pressing standard buttons

- left mouse button to rotate objects

- mouse wheel to zoom to an object

- right mouse button to move an object

Android:

- accelerometer to move

- touch with one finger to shoot

- touch with three fingers to pause the game

- touch with two fingers to open the inventory

- three fingers to rotate objects

- two fingers to zoom to an object

-one finger to move objects
